name: The Last Knight (Jacob R Games, Zack McDonald)
name_original: The Last Knight (Jacob R Games, Zack McDonald)
description:
Game description
The Last Knight is a 2d side-scrolling action game where you play as a knight making his way through multiple levels to take revenge on the evil wizard who killed your king and took your lands. 

Story description
You must fight the evil wizard that has plagued your lands. Put an end to his evil desire to take over the world with his nasty creations. Please, wandering Knight, would you fight the evil wizard and take back your land.

Early development
This game is still in early development, so currently, many things are missing and will be worked on soon. Any feedback on how we can make this game any better would be greatly appreciated.
